text: Middle Ground may refer to: ==Places== *Middle Ground (New Rochelle), a large submerged reef in the city of New Rochelle, New York, United States *Middle Ground (India), an island within Mumbai Harbour, India ==Art and entertainment== *The Middle Ground, a 1980 novel by Margaret Drabble *"Middle Ground" (The Wire), a 2004 television episode ==Other== * Middle ground (also: middle-ground or middleground), an artistic space, located between background and foreground * Middleground (1947–1972), American Thoroughbred racehorse * Argument to moderation, a logical fallacy that states that the "middle ground" is always correct
title: Middle Ground
